programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A group of suspects race a stolen SUV through a residential neighborhood. A drunk man has a kitchen knife and a listening problem. Two usual suspects are going back to jail for their latest escapades.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An attempted pull over results in a foot chase and eventual arrest. An officer makes a drug-related arrest during a routine traffic stop. An officer makes a sizeable drug seizure during a field sobriety check.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.sub-title: S15 : E34 Copy of Warning shot
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.desc: Officers engage in a car chase when they spot a possible robbery suspect. A man nicknamed “Danger” is tasered after assaulting several girls. Suspects bail from a vehicle and hide under a porch.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A disastrous carjacking results in an arrest. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call involving two women. Officers find drug paraphernalia on a suspicious man parked in the middle of the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An investigation involving two suspicious men in parked cars results in a foot chase and drug bust. An officer responds to a domestic call involving a threatening exhusband who is taken into custody. Officers in Florida question a deceptive and drug using couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple flees a routine traffic stop. An intoxicated woman climbs a tree. Construction workers are pulled over for a hand-to-hand transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.desc: A man needs police assistance when his angry ex-girlfriend crawls through his window. Police must play hide-and-seek when they attempt to execute an arrest warrant. A man is threatened with violence when he refuses to turn his car’s headlights off.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers search for suspects stealing rims at a car dealership. A married couple claim drugs found in their car were from a nearby ditch. Officers detain an inebriated man arguing with a store clerk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.desc: A man wanted for unpaid child support hides from deputies. Officers respond to a sexual predator following a minor. A man with a checkered driving record crashes his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies search for a man who ran from a traffic stop. A man being pursued tells officers he was going to his mother’s house. A drunk driver won’t admit to hitting a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: After a tow service employee denies a woman her car back, she uses his body for batting practice. A man with a warrant explains his medicinal meth use. No lie is too big for a couple trying to convince officers they didn’t shoplift.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A sibling calls authorities when his belligerent brother refuses to leave. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle at a local gas station.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects who were believed to have been involved in a robbery. Police attend to a man who has injected a concerning amount of methamphetamine. Officers break up a fight in progress involving two men outside a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Rather than stop, a driver decides to lead police on a high-speed chase. A woman is shot at by her ‘sugar daddy.’ A fleeing suspect dumps a suspicious liquid out of his window.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested for peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase, officers bring down a local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a mobile home park.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Stingray Remember the '80s
programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his buddies are game for something wild. Rob obliges with a 5-star menu that includes smoked quail, grilled venison chops, stacked sweet potatoes and grilled brussel sprouts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's backyard is going to the dogs thanks to his new canine friend, Freddy. He and his dog loving friends enjoy a grilled breakfast before the daily walk to the dog park. French toast, bacon, sausage potato hash browns and baked eggs in hams crisps have everyone panting and taking home doggie bags.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's friend Rick just got his big job promotion and it time to cel-ah -brate! The food is executive class all the way, with grilled raspberry Cornish hens, roasted beefeater tomatoes, spicy ground beef skewers, eggplant & squash salad and grilled nectarines over ice cream.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's Saturday and Rob invites some friends over for a swim, some laughs and some great food grilled on his new charcoal BBQ. Rob goes all out preparing pizza, nachos, grilled shrimp quesadillas and buffalo burgers. Why? Just because! You never really need a reason to fire up some good times.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It is a three alarm feast when Rob throws a BBQ party for the local volunteer firefighters. His guests like it hot and Rob spices things up with big juicy steaks, grilled peppers, smoked ribs, plus hot and hotter and the hottest bbq sauces.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having the Ultimate BBQ with his fellow Ultimate Frisbee players. His hammer throw may need some work, but Rob grilled spread of seafood kabobs, baked potatoes, grilled vegetable and tortellini salad and roasted leg of lamb are champions.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Everyone should treat Mom to a special breakfast! Matt and his team treated a crowd on Mother's Day to a BBQed Brunch. They feasted on Stuffed Blueberry Mascarpone French Toast, a Veggie Frittata, Applewood Smoked Canadian Bacon, and Fresh Fruit Smoothies

programme.title: Road Grill

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill Team go to a neighbourhood Garage Sale, then treat everyone to everyday dishes with a twist. Matt and his team grill up some Grilled Porterhouse Steaks in a Homemade Steak Spice; Grilled Lemon Prosciutto Scallops; Planked Stuffed Potatoes and a Grilled Caesar Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt loves animals - including dogs. He goes to a Dog Show to give dog lovers a little taste of what the QB is cooking - Garlicky Grilled Artichokes; Bacon Wrapped Halibut With Lime Scallion Sauce Sauce; Slow Cooked Spareribs With Guava Glaze; and A Summer Wild Berry Crisp.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team grill up some chow at a bike ride Fundraiser. They tempt the crowd with Hazelnut Crusted Halibut with Strawberry Salsa, Pork Picnic Roast with Blackberry Chipotle Glaze, Grilled Paninis with Roast Veggies, and Spinach Salad with Apples, Bacon and Cashews

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: In celebration of past boys trips to Mexico, the gang gathers to reminisce and relive their rowdy ways. Smoked Turkey enchiladas, Mexican chicken, steak tacos, and sangria dress the table while the boys fiesta the night away.

programme.desc: Vegetarians walk amongst us, and Rob gets challenged by his veggie loving friend to grill up a meatless BBQ. Rob steps up to the grill and demonstrates that he can grill it all! programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's Tennis Tournament BBQ is a smash with lamb shanks, roasted garlic mashed potatoes and black bean mussels. His guests all agree when it comes to barbequing Rob has the best serve.

programme.title: License to Grill

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini highlights the tiny region of Molise, exposing some of its best kept savoury secrets. Starting with a classic, Michael cooks up a delicious multi-layered Chicory Timbale, a pie filled with fresh chicory, ripe roma tomatoes, and sliced prosciutto. To crisp up the top of the pie, Michael tops his delicious dish with finely grated pecorino cheese and crunchy breadcrumbs. Next up, Michael's primo is a spicy Octopus in Purgatory. This tender, colourful, and sumptuous dish is sure to impress in both looks and taste! For his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional Marinated Rabbit. Stewed in wine, tomatoes, and chilies, this rustic dish will have your guests asking for...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle D'Aosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. First up is Michael's antipasto of Wild Mushrooms and Lardo on Rye. Coated with rich, earthy mushrooms, buttery fontina cheese, and savoury cured pork, this decadent dish highlights a combination of iconic flavours from Valle D'Aosta. Next up is a twist on traditional pasta with Valle D'Aosta's unique Chestnut Fettucine topped with Sweet Pork and Earthy Cabbage. The secret to this dish? Chestnut flour to create a denser, sweeter, and nuttier pasta. For his secondo, Michael turns to the pride of the region, Fontina cheese,...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The popular region of Tuscany is known for its wines, cheeses, and gorgeous sights. Chef Michael Bonacini introduces us to Tuscany's fine cuisine with four of his favourite dishes. Michael draws attention to the importance of mushrooms in Tuscan culture with an antipasto: Many Mushroom soup. Warm, hearty, and full of earthy flavour, Michael tops this soup with fried sage leaves to combine comfort and crunch in a single bite. For his primo, Michael explores a Tuscan favourite - Lamb Ragu! Served over pici noodles, Michael's rich ragu is complemented by fresh, light herbs. Then, Michael serves up a Porchetta-Style Duck, a crispy and tender secondo. To bring his meal together, Michael ends...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether you're in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michael's Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy

Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy

To introduce us to Lazio, Host Michael Bonacini highlights its Jewish influence with a crispy Roman Jewish-style Artichokes. As crunchy as a potato chip, Michael's artichokes are a delicious fried treat that are a perfect way to kick off a delicious meal. For his primo Michael brings together simple ingredients to create a rich Bucatini with Amatriciana Sauce. Michael's secondo turns what was once peasant food into a delectable and tender dish. Cooked with a blend of vegetables and sauce, Michael's Braised Oxtail brings forth the history of cuisine. Returning to Rome for his...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy

programme.desc: Endearing host Pailin Chongchinant makes three popular Thai dishes: Coconut Chicken Soup, Green Papaya Salad, and the most famous, Pad Thai.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Classic Sunday Dishes Made in Weeknight Time
programme.desc: Charming cook Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up four multi-cooker dishes that save on time but are bursting with flavour.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Northern Cuisine: Chiang Mai
programme.desc: Thai chef Pailin Chongchitnant explores the cuisine of Northern Thai city Chiang Mai with red chili pork dip, minced pork salad, Thai-style chicken noodle soup, and Burmese-style curry.

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: If mace, fenugreek, and cloves aren't at the front of your spice shelf yet, they will be by the end of this episode! Co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim bring these spices to a trio of fabulous recipes! First, octopus gets a slow bath in mace-scented olive oil before picking up a smoky char on the grill. A refreshing Thai Mango Salad gets amped up with the big flavour of fenugreek. Lastly, lamb chops get treated to an aromatic marinade of clove-spiked basil and parsley pesto.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Sweet and sour are definitely on the menu as Thai-born chef Pailin Chongchitnant whips up glass noodle salad, sour curry, sweet and sour stir fry, and pineapple and lychee in iced syrup.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Thailand, France, Sweden, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Thailand - Carrot Pad Thai, France - Ground Cherry Salad, Sweden - Swedish Pecan Balls, and Italy - Corn Farroto!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Bok Choy, Duck, Shrimp Fritters, and Pot Roast
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, seared Bok choy with chilli crisps. Next, sous-vide peach duck! Followed by shrimp fritters with caramel sauce, and braised tuna steaks!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Oysters, Mac ‘n’ Cheese, Pear Salad and Halibut
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, potato chip crusted oysters! Next, lamb shank mac and cheese! Followed by a poached pear Roquefort salad, and shrimp-crusted halibut!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Food nerd Desiree Nielsen masters a perfectly cooked eggplant topped with a flavourful charmoula and couscous.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen shows how beets can make the icing on a delectable cupcake vibrant and delicious.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Foodie Desiree Nielsen gives life to spotty bananas, transforming it into melt-in-your-mouth bread.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Luis "Tigretón" Leon cooks up three succulent dishes that are sure to please any garlic lover.

programme.title: Cook the Books
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: Pasta Every Day by Meryl Feinstein! Follow along as Shahir demonstrates how to make a variety of pasta shapes, like cavatelli, farfalle, and gnocchi, complete with delicious sauces!

programme.title: Cheeseburgers of the World

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Be it the world’s tallest building or one of the world’s largest man-made marinas, Dubai has always been a city firmly in charge of writing its own story. Renowned traveler, Sabrina discovers this, as she visits Dubai’s own tropical rainforest and a wildlife sanctuary that is home to wild flamingos. She also learns about the city's roots at Bastakiya, the old quarter full of sand-colored houses with open courtyards and narrow alleyways, and Al Fahidi Fort, the city's oldest structure.

programme.title: Best From The Rest

programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Landmarks Dead Sea, Jordan

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kissed By The Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Penghu, an archipelago of islands in Taiwan, is a tropical haven infused with oriental flavour. Travel junkie, Alex Drobin discovers this when he enjoys the balance between adventures such as snorkelling and banana boat and exploring the local culture through sights rife with local legends such as a temple dedicated to the goddess of the sea and the Four eye well. He also tries fresh seafood and local Taiwanese dishes such as cactus ice cream.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Unwind Hotel Ellbee, India
programme.desc: Rishikesh, the heartland of yoga, is widely known for mystical stories, spiritual awakenings, rejuvenation and peace. Travel enthusiast, Larissa D’Sa comes to Rishikesh looking for a relaxing getaway, and loses herself in its natural beauty. From relishing earthy Garhwali flavours to witnessing the larger-than-life Ganga aarti, her experiences in the land, where great sages and famous musicians came to find peace, help her to unwind.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Burn Appetit Graz, Austria
programme.desc: Set among the farms and vineyards of Styria, the city of Graz has quietly become the culinary crowning jewel of Austria.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: A classic steam locomotive leading you to a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside - sounds like a story, doesn’t it? Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty make this story come true with an onsen or a traditional Japanese hot spring bath in Hitoyoshi, an idyllic town surrounded by mountains and blessed with the Kumagawa river.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bucket List Takachiho, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at the staggeringly high Kobae Bridge. Following this, they explore some rejuvenating nature trails at Takachiho, stumble upon a shrine in a park, and learn the story behind it in a riveting manner, later that day.

programme.title: City Breaks

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: The caldera, Mount Aso, is home to Japan’s most active volcano. It is also the perfect destination for those seeking an adrenaline rush and some breathtaking views. Amidst the various moods of the caldera, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore the unique experiences this caldera has to offer.

programme.title: Off The Grid Libreville, Gabon
programme.desc: The capital of Gabon, Libreville offers an off the grid route to the host Emeline. From the scenic trails of Pongara National Park to exciting beach experiences, Libreville comes across as a pleasant surprise. But what’s more exciting is watching a number of sea turtles making their nests and hatching eggs near the beach. Emeline’s quest also leads her to a tête-à-tête with a conservationist where she learns about saving turtles.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kissed By The Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Penghu, an archipelago of islands in Taiwan, is a tropical haven infused with oriental flavour. Travel junkie, Alex Drobin discovers this when he enjoys the balance between adventures such as snorkelling and banana boat and exploring the local culture through sights rife with local legends such as a temple dedicated to the goddess of the sea and the Four eye well. He also tries fresh seafood and local Taiwanese dishes such as cactus ice cream.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Be it the world’s tallest building or one of the world’s largest man-made marinas, Dubai has always been a city firmly in charge of writing its own story. Renowned traveler, Sabrina discovers this, as she visits Dubai’s own tropical rainforest and a wildlife sanctuary that is home to wild flamingos. She also learns about the city's roots at Bastakiya, the old quarter full of sand-colored houses with open courtyards and narrow alleyways, and Al Fahidi Fort, the city's oldest structure.

programme.desc: Watch all the highlights from the second stage of Rallye du Maroc.

programme.title: Why Cadillac believe they're ready to fight in F1 2026 - interview with Graeme Lowdon Team Principal
programme.desc: In a one-on-one interview, Motorsport.com Editor-In-Chief Ben Hunt sits down with Team Principal of the Cadillac F1 Team; Graeme Lowdon, to check in their progress with their debut race less than 250 days away. In the interview, Graeme talks about why he’s championing diversity as the builds the infrastructure of the team, the two-year long application process to get on the grid, what General Motors are bringing to the table on and off the track, and a hint as to their approach in selecting drivers, with their 2026 lineup still up in the air.

programme.title: Race Rewind: Battle at The Brickyard settled in double overtime
programme.desc: See the top highlights from Indianapolis Motor Speedway in a Cup Series race that was settled in double overtime.

programme.title: Spa Drama Recap & What to Expect in Hungary! | F1 Review & Preview
programme.desc: This week, Stuart Colding, Haydn Cobb and Ronald Vording take a look back at the F1 Belgian Grand Prix and how it may affect this week’s Hungarian Grand Prix. McLaren on top, rain delays raising questions, who is responsible for Antonelli’s struggles, Verstappen’s Sprint win and Yuki’s strategy fumbles, plus the fierce midfield battle lead the discussion. They also cover off the potential return of Istanbul Park to the F1 Calendar and who on the grid is looking forward to the summer break the most!

programme.title: Why the 'second' Niki Lauda was even better than the first
programme.desc: As the Formula 1 paddock sets up in Monaco, the late Niki Lauda is not far from anyone's thoughts following his death earlier this week. Inside the paddock, Edd Straw is joined by Giorgio Piola, who knew Lauda throughout his F1 career, to get a very personal account of what it was like to know the three-time world champion. Piola explains what made Lauda tick, and how his accident in 1976 changed him into a new person who was "even more wonderful than the first".

programme.title: 9 interesting F1 tests that didn’t lead to anything
programme.desc: Formula 1 testing has thrown up some interesting car and driver combinations over the years, and as this list shows, plenty of top-name drivers have turned up in unexpected places. But sometimes a test deal catches the eye then doesn’t lead to a more permanent arrangement, for a wide variety of reasons. Here we take a look at nine particularly high-profile drivers who had a brief try-out with a team, but didn’t end up signing a proper deal

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: The history of driver bans in Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 drivers very rarely get banned from races - in fact, just five times in the history of the world championship has a driver sat out a race due to an official FIA sanction. But, unsurprisingly, F1's history of bans is a bit more complicated than that, so in this video we also look at the other drivers who have served what could be termed as 'unofficial' bans over the course of F1 history.

programme.title: Episode 6: Hellas Rally Raid and Monster Jam
programme.desc: Gearing Up is back with another thrilling episode that takes you on an exhilarating journey around the globe, showcasing the most unique and intense competitions the world has to offer. In this episode, high skills, a passion for technology, an impatience for innovation, and a pure love for adrenaline are combined at their best. Buckle up, rev your engines, and get ready for some electrifying action as you experience the thrill of full G-force! The episode kicks off with Hellas Rally Raid. The Hellas Rally Raid is an international off-road motorsports event held annually in the landscapes of Greece. Spanning 7 days, it challenges riders and drivers to navigate through hundreds of...

programme.title: TCR South America 2025 | Round 4: Termas de Río Hondo - Race 1
programme.desc: Watch race 1 of the fourth round of the 2025 TCR South America season at Termas de Río Hondo, Argentina.

programme.title: From Wheelchair to Race Car - How Robert Wickens Overcame the Odds
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.title: What Horner's sacking really means for Verstappen, F1 and Red Bull
programme.desc: After 20 years of service as Team Principal of Red Bull Racing, Christian Horner has been sacked by the team with immediate effect, with Laurent Meikes replacing Horner as Red Bull CEO, and Alan Permane taking Meikes’ job as Racing Bulls Team Principal. James Allen is joined in the studio to analyse the news with our correspondents Ronald Vording, Christian Nimmervoll and Ben Hunt to analyse what led to Horner’s sacking, what role Max Verstappen and his camp may have played in the decision, and what it means for Red Bull, Racing Bulls, and maybe even Ferrari in the future…

programme.title: Road to 2026, Episode 1: The Journey So Far
programme.desc: Before looking to the future and 2026's regulation changes, first we must look back at the past. In episode one of our new Road to 2026 series with PETRONAS Motorsports we look at the history of the partnership, the origin of hybrid technology in F1, and how, together, we've pushed the boundaries of innovation.

programme.title: Le Mans Classic 2025
programme.desc: Step back in time at Le Mans Classic, where we meet legendary race drivers and passionate car collectors to explore the enduring legacy of vintage machines. From the roaring icons of 1923 to the sleek speedsters of the ’90s, experience the full spectrum of historic racing — on and off the track.

programme.title: 2 + 4 = 24 documentary
programme.desc: 1 Rider. 1 Driver. 2 Races - each over 24 hours. 24 hours are always tough, no matter where you do it. Australian bike rider Josh Hook on Honda Fireblade and Portuguese racing driver Tiago Monteiro on Honda Civic Type R walk us through the challenging endurance races in detail and answer the question: what is it like to be a 2-wheel and 4-wheel race gladiator? Follow Josh Hook and Tiago Monteiro to the edges of hell and back in the two toughest 24 Hour races of 2020: 24 Hours of Nurburgring and 24 Heures Motos at Le Mans.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.desc: Watch the third race of the 2025 Super Formula championship season at Mobility Resort Motegi.

programme.title: When Indycar Conquered F1 - Monzanapolis
programme.desc: Using the 2.6 mile oval circuit at Monza, Indycar and Formula 1 came together in the 1950's for an epic race showdown, but even with Ferrari and Jaguar leading the pack for the European teams, they were still outpaced by the Americans. In the latest episode in our “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when Indycar conquered F1.

programme.title: How This Troubled Car Drove F1's Greatest Qualifying Lap
programme.desc: From Senna to Schumacher to Hamilton, there are some great qualifiers in Formula 1, but who exactly has had the best qualifying lap in F1 history? In this episode of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner picks out F1’s greatest qualifying laps.

programme.title: What Impact Does the Weather Have on F1?
programme.desc: Rain, wind, temperature… there are so many factors that impact an F1 weekend ️☀️️ So, how do the engineers, strategists and drivers react to changing conditions? programme.title: Sir Jackie Stewart: The Flying Scot
programme.desc: Looking back on his eventful life and career, triple world champion Sir Jackie Stewart talks exclusively to Peter Windsor, in depth.

programme.title: Porsche Cup Brasil 2025 | Round 4: Portimão - Race 2 (EN) |
programme.desc: Watch race 2 of the fourth round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Internacional do Algarve.

programme.title: Transcordilleras
programme.desc: Transcordilleras is a 1,000-kilometer self-supported bikepacking race across the Andes in Colombia. This year, the organizers offered three-stage, eight-stage, and non-stop versions of the event.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Open Faces & X Over Ride
programme.desc: This episode is all about talent. First, The young guns of the global freeride scene gather in Austria to battle it out for the world titles. Then, an FWT Qualifier and an FWT Challenger event will decide who will advance to the elite level of the Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Cape Epic 2019 - WOMEN Race Summary - Cape Town (RSA)
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route takes amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world through approximately 700 km of untouched landscape and 15,000 meters of climbing

programme.title: Mbuzi Dume - Strong Goat - Kilimandscharo (TZN)
programme.desc: Tom Belz was faced with the challenge of his life: The 31-year-old goes through life with one leg and two crutches and then climbs the highest mountain in Africa. He also wants to encourage others with his own story.

programme.title: Frozen Waterfalls - Icekayaking - Iceland
programme.desc: Godafoss is one of the most famous waterfalls in Iceland. Four kayak experts set out to paddle this place and also visit other places in Iceland that - in winter - are not without dangers

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #29: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Axamer, Lizum (AUT)
programme.desc: The World Downhill Skateboarding Championships in Axamer Lizum, Austria, kicked off the 2025 season from June 13 to 15. Around 80 riders from more than 15 countries competed over three days of training, qualifying runs and finals.

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: Challenge Roth 2025 - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025 is one of the world’s most iconic long-distance triathlons, taking place in Roth, Germany on July 6, 2025. It’s more than a race-it’s a celebration of endurance, community, and triathlon history.

programme.desc: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025 is one of the world’s most iconic long-distance triathlons, taking place in Roth, Germany on July 6, 2025. It’s more than a race-it’s a celebration of endurance, community, and triathlon history.

programme.desc: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025 is one of the world’s most iconic long-distance triathlons, taking place in Roth, Germany on July 6, 2025. It’s more than a race-it’s a celebration of endurance, community, and triathlon history.

programme.desc: Actionclip OERM22 AUT Traum Kurzfilm

programme.title: Climbing Special - Worldwide
programme.desc: Kashmir, the Moab Desert, the famous Matterhorn, icefalls in Norway and Patagonia. We look back on breathtaking adventures, incredible alpine records and never-before-imagined new ascents

programme.title: Golden Fly Series - Golden Roof Challenge - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: The spectacular high and long jump event: Within just a few years, the Int. Golden Roof Challenge has developed into an absolute cult event! Viewer interest as well as media reach increases from year to year.

programme.title: Young & Wild - Extreme Wildwater Kayaking - Worlwide
programme.desc: Adrian Mattern alias Atte is the shooting star of the German whitewater scene. He travels the world more uncompromisingly than any other kayaker currently. His overwhelming achievements have left their mark on the international paddling scene.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1

programme.title: Eternal Flame
programme.desc: To jump from the top of Nameless Tower in Pakistan (6200m) after climbing the Eternal Flame route is to combine the ascent of one of the most beautiful climbing routes in the world with the opening of one of the most breathtaking BASE jumping exits imaginable.

programme.title: Kald Sòl
programme.desc: The film sheds light on the surprising resources of cold countries, and on the search for waves guided by climatic uncertainties. Samuel Redon, a young professional surfer accustomed to warm-water surfing, is about to discover a whole new world of surfing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Vom 15. bis 19. August kämpfen Zweierteams im malerischen Graubünden um den Gesamtsieg und wichtige UCI-Mountainbike-Punkte beim Swiss Epic. Mit mehr als 350km und fast 12.000 Höhenmetern wird den besten Mountainbikern alles abverlangt.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zurück, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit André Baran antreten.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 & #4
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode reisen wir nach Italien und Belgien zu Runde 3 und 4 der World E-Bike Series. Die weltbesten Mountainbikerinnen und Mountainbiker werden darum kämpfen, wer in der Mitte des Rennkalenders die Führung übernimmt.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukünftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #29: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Axamer, Lizum (AUT)
programme.desc: The World Downhill Skateboarding Championships in Axamer Lizum, Austria, kicked off the 2025 season from June 13 to 15. Around 80 riders from more than 15 countries competed over three days of training, qualifying runs and finals.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Swatch Nines 2023 - Pedal To The Metal
programme.desc: Experience 24 minutes of adrenaline-fueled feats as Nicholi Rogatkin (USA) and Casey Brown (CAN) take viewers through the final highlight edit of the 2023 Swatch Nines Mountain Bike event at Germany's Green Hill Bikepark, held from the 14th to the 19th of August.

programme.title: If it’s easy it’s not fun
programme.desc: Join us on a beatiful adventures through the sky and desert of Jordan, where three french friends seek for adrenalin and creacks in the sandstone of Wadirum (JOR).

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Extremsportveko "The Beauty of Outdoor Sports"
programme.desc: Today, we travel all the way up to Voss, the adventure Capital of Norway, where the “Extremesportsveko” takes place once a year. During this week, national and international athletes compete and challenge themselves in their elements.

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.title: Kayak Expedition Norway "Whitewater Polar Circle"
programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - MTB Roadtrip - Athlete Profile Andrew Taylor (USA)
programme.desc: laska has always been a dream-riding destination for 28-year-old American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown Santa Cruz, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: BetCity Royal Championships Queen & King of the Court 2023

programme.title: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
